v8:item.v8:content: Any additional information related to the document
Department for which salary is calculated
Earning currency. The document is filled in only with those scheduled earnings which have the currency equal to the document currency.
Information about salary accrued to employees and related expence account
Employee to whom salary is accrued
Employee position during the period specified in the line
Start date, end date - period for which employee's salary is calculated with selected parameters
Start date, end date - period for which employee's salary is calculated with selected parameters
Number of hours the employee has worked at the specified position with the specified parameters of salary accounting (filled in automatically according to the timesheet)

Shows whether a line can be manually corrected and excluded from the auto recalculation
